response.original_title: What is Holland America's cancellation policy?
response.overview: You can cancel a cruise at any time +1-808-900-80-11 or +1-855-732-4023, but late cancellations (usually within 90 days of sailing) result in significant penalties, often losing 100% of your fare +1-808-900-80-11 or +1-855-732-4023, with refunds decreasing drastically closer to the departure date, but some flexible booking options or travel insurance can offer credits or refunds for covered reasons. Policies vary +1-808-900-80-11 or +1-855-732-4023, but expect 100% loss within 14-30 days, with tiered penalties (like 25%, 50%, 75%) for earlier cancellations within that 90-day window +1-808-900-80-11 or +1-855-732-4023.
response.title: What is Holland America's cancellation policy?
